---
name: Feature request
about: Template for proposing new features or improvements
title: "[Feature] Short, clear title"
labels: enhancement
assignees: Shinoryo

---

## Summary

Provide a brief description of the feature or improvement.

## Background

Explain why this is needed and how it helps.

## Proposal

Describe a concrete idea for how you want this implemented.

## References / Links

Add any helpful references or links.

## Additional context

Add any other context or notes here.
